CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
OldVersion.description: ,The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Discover feed for channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can access a personalized feed based on important updates in the channels they are a part of.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Discover feed for channels
OldVersion.description: Users can access a personalized feed based on important updates in the channels they are a part of.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic Targeting based on roles for Frontline
CurrentVersion.description: Frontline teams can notify the right set of colleagues on channel posts (e.g. notify colleagues in specific role or department)

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic Targeting based on roles for Frontline
OldVersion.description: Frontline teams can notify the right set of colleagues on channel posts (e.g. notify colleagues in specific role or department)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
OldVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy tuning analysis for priority content-only policies
CurrentVersion.description: ,Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction of the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. With this update, policy tuning analysis will support insider risk policies that are scoped for priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy tuning analysis for priority content-only policies
OldVersion.description: ,Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction of the number of users in a tenant that could potentially match a given set of policy conditions. With this update, policy tuning analysis will support insider risk policies that are scoped for priority content. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search in Viva Connections on iOS and Android tablet
CurrentVersion.description: This adds a search entry point and a new tailored experience for Viva Connection users on iOS and Android tablets.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search in Viva Connections on iOS and Android tablet
OldVersion.description: This adds a search entry point and a new tailored experience for Viva Connection users on iOS and Android tablets.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Describe it to design it within Teams Workflows
CurrentVersion.description: Can't find a workflow template that matches what you need? You will now be able to describe in detail on how you want your automation to work and from that description generate a workflow to match your needs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Describe it to design it within Teams Workflows
OldVersion.description: Can't find a workflow template that matches what you need? You will now be able to describe in detail on how you want your automation to work and from that description generate a workflow to match your needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams Meetings will take the meeting chat into account
CurrentVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in Teams Meetings a question, it will use the chat and transcript as the source.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams meeting chat will take the meeting transcript into account
OldVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in the meeting chat a question, it will use the chat and transcript content as the source.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Updates to Settings pages on privacy, security, search, & services
CurrentVersion.description: To improve ease of use, we are updating Edge settings page into two sections: ‘Privacy and Security’ and ‘Search and Services.’ This streamlined approach should enable users to find the settings they are interested in more easily.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Updates to Settings pages on privacy, security, search, & services
OldVersion.description: To improve ease of use, we are updating Edge settings page into two sections: ‘Privacy and Security’ and ‘Search and Services.’ This streamlined approach should enable users to find the settings they are interested in more easily.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search - UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search - UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
OldVersion.description: Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent for transcription in Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: The meeting policy that requires explicit consent to be recorded is expanding to include transcription. When the policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of all participants to be transcribed and recorded. Before a user gives consent, the user cannot unmute, turn on camera or share content in the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent for transcription in Teams meetings
OldVersion.description: The meeting policy that requires explicit consent to be recorded is expanding to include transcription. When the policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of all participants to be transcribed and recorded. Before a user gives consent, the user cannot unmute, turn on camera or share content in the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Sync admin reports - GCC
CurrentVersion.description: We are adding support for the OneDrive Sync admin reports for the GCC environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhancements to the device onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: ,This adds new enhancements to the device onboarding page, including these: search by IP address to look up devices, filter using the new "Valid user" filter, use a refined device list to only include devices that can be DLP supported (exclude Android devices from showing in the device onboarding list), and use new properties in the export report (valid user, first onboarded date, MDATP device ID, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, Endpoint DLP status, last policy sync time, and Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Entry point change - apps when reading emails moved to the ribbon
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Apps flyout and entry point for pinned apps will be moved to the Home tab in the Ribbon in the New Outlook and Outlook for Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Cloud Policy service audit logs for policy changes
CurrentVersion.description: ,Activities performed by administrators within the Cloud Policy service, like editing a policy configuration, will generate Audit logs stored in Purview Audit and will be accessible by Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Ability to target Conditional Access (CA) policies to a single application that applies to both the Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop apps
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop share a common framework for identity access by using Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) and security controls with CA policies. You can target CA policies to the Windows 365 app and this applies only to windows365.microsoft.com web client. To apply CA policies to the full Windows client and non-windows clients, you must assign CA policies to both the Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop apps. This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer applicable.

OldVersion.title: Windows 365: Ability to target Conditional Access (CA) policies to a single application that applies to both the Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop apps
OldVersion.description: Currently, Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop share a common framework for identity access by using Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) and security controls with CA policies. You can target CA policies to the Windows 365 app and this applies only to windows365.microsoft.com web client. To apply CA policies to the full Windows client and non-windows clients, you must assign CA policies to both the Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent message translation in chats
CurrentVersion.description: When you get a message in a different language, you will see translation suggested to help you understand it better. In the settings, you can select which languages you don't want to translate, and whether to translate messages automatically.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent message translation in chats
OldVersion.description: When you get a message in a different language, you will see translation suggested to help you understand it better. In the settings, you can select which languages you don't want to translate, and whether to translate messages automatically.
